title: Nailed By Dragons
description: Sam, a prince from Drudgedor goes on a quest to find the believed to be extinct dragons that use to roam the nearby cliffs of his village. After saving his life, Sam has only one way to repay the beasts that are in fact alive and well! This is a dragon sex novel, do not read if under the age of 18. This is a 3,000 word hardcore gay dragon story, featuring anal, double anal, and anal cream pies.
author: Hunter Fox
